\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 65465}

\subsection*{Not Much More Intelligent or Aware}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Phenytoin}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Pharms - Phenytoin & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 180.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I was prescribed Dilantin, or Phenytoin, as it is classified on the bottle, a short time after I had started suffering seizures from abusing Xanax. I seldom use it, but I do experiment with it from time to time\ldots truth be told, I never felt much more intelligent or aware or focused while on the drug, unless I was clean from the Xanax for two weeks, and injested more than the clinicly prescribed dosage (100-300 mgs). 

          

The `Intelligence' I felt was very erratic, as though, I did not know what I wanted to do\ldots the focus was definitely there, but I my attention span was decreased exponentially. I'd start a project and leave it unfinished.

\end{document}
